name: Who's Hunting Betty-Sue?
description:
Unfortunately, in our haste, we accidentally used the wrong audio file in the introduction - how embarrassing! Please ignore!

Other bugs:

  • Omitted instructions to kill all enemies in 3rd level. To progress you need to kill all the enemies.
  • No final boss. The game ends in the final level because we accidentally killed the boss.
  • The burger form collision shape is bugged (the sprite was added last minute).

Play downloadable version for optimal experience.

Puzzle platformer created for Godot Wild Jam 43.

In a world where sentient creatures and humans have happily coexisted for millennia, a lonely cow wakes up in a ditch, robbed and alone, with nothing to her name but a crumpled photo of herself and her two pals, Cheese and Bun. Lead Betty-Sue the cow to safety, and don't forget her friends!
